title: crashes
body: how can i fix it its happning every game every 4-5 minutes

replies.body:
Without having any context on what happening when your game crashed, it's a little hard to try to diagnose. If you can give me a little more info on what was going on when you hit that crash I can dig a little deeper.

Until then, check out our general [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). It covers most of the typical causes of client crashes and should be able to get you back in the game.
